  function showPhoto(num) {
    const img = document.getElementById("interest-photo");
    const caption = document.getElementById("photo-caption");

    // Fade out
    img.classList.add("fade-out");
    caption.classList.add("fade-out");

    setTimeout(() => {
      img.src = photoData[num].src;
      caption.textContent = photoData[num].caption;

      // Fade back in
      img.classList.remove("fade-out");
      caption.classList.remove("fade-out");
    }, 200);
  }
</script>
